properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning until 9:00 PM CDT for Central Cook County â€” PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago IL has issued a

* Flash Flood Warning for...
  Central Cook County.

* Until 9:00 PM CDT.

* At 8:00 PM CDT, heavy rain and flash flooding were reported in the area. Floodwaters are moving rapidly in low-lying and urban areas.

  THIS IS A PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. MOVE TO HIGHER GROUND IMMEDIATELY!

  HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding.

  SOURCE...Radar indicated heavy rainfall and local emergency reports.

  IMPACT...Roads and low-lying areas are inundated. Vehicles can be swept away. Buildings may be flooded. Do not attempt to drive through flooded roads.

* Locations impacted include...
  Oak Brook, Cicero, Berwyn, and surrounding areas.
properties.instruction: Move to higher ground immediately. Avoid all flooded roadways and low-lying areas. Stay tuned to local updates.
